Beast Master is a Subclass of Ranger in Baldur's Gate 3. Beast Masters primary ability is Dexterity, their saving throw proficiencies are Dexterity & Intelligence and they have a Hit Dice of 1d10. They have proficiency with Simple Weapons, Martial We
